component.name: ObserverTest
component.script:
sub init() m.label1 = m.top.findNode("label1") m.label2 = m.top.findNode("label2")
' Observe changes to both labels m.label1.observeField("text", "onLabel1Changed") m.label2.observeField("text", "onLabel2Changed") end sub
sub onLabel1Changed(event as object) print "Label1 changed to: "; event.getData() end sub
sub onLabel2Changed(event as object) print "Label2 changed to: "; event.getData() end sub
